name: Halls of the Occult
description:
Halls of the Occult

A ClickJam Weirder Stuff game by Rhys Davies 2016

http://www.rhysd.com
http://clickjam.clickteam.com

You are a prisoner, in for life. Your only chance at freedom is volunteering for quite the unusual experiment. Driven by the disappearance of his nephew, by largely his own fault, the Prison Warden's mad scientist brother has concocted a plan to get him back. You, the volunteer prisoner, must enter the ethereal plane known as 'The Halls of the Occult' to find the lost boy and rescue him. Doing so will reward you with your release from prison, no questions asked. However, it's a deadly risk not many people are willing to take. Are you willing to gamble your life for your freedom?

Controls
Movement - W, A, S, D
Aim / Attack - Mouse / Left Mouse Button
